Atsu Kakitani

Full-Stack Designgeneer

Hi, I'm Atsu! I'm currently an EECS student at UC Berkeley, and I like making things. I can work on all parts of a tech stack, but I especially like working at the very bottom (infrastructure) and the very top (UI/UX). When I'm away from a laptop, you can find me climbing, writing music, or longboarding down the Berkeley hills.
